title: Matchmaking...

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Ok I'm here to rant again. Why does it seem in so many of my games that one team has never played before while the other has mained that role for years, i get blamed for losing games because im the jungler who 'kill steals'. When in reality, i did all the damage anyways. Just, look at this match report, feel my pain, and then whine about how i shouldnt blame my team as i know somebody will. warning graphic content may cause harm to some viewers eyes.

replies.body:
No idea what this thread has to do with matchmaking.
Everyone on both teams are of similar MMR. Everyone on your team (except annie) have been playing ranked since S4 at least. 

It just looks like your lanes were all having a hard time. Maybe they weren't familiar with the matchups, or weren't the best at playing safe.
Its better to give the kills to your carry, try to not take the kills unless u have to. Alot of your games you have very little assists.
Thats because in a lot of my games nobody can get a kill

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tY60EhGQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-26T08:42:18.448+0000)
>
> Its better to give the kills to your carry, try to not take the kills unless u have to. Alot of your games you have very little assists.

He's right, unless you intend on carrying the game, leave as many kills as you can. also its not about "you shouldnt blame your team" but more of "what could you have done better". your top and mid got stomped you need to help them more, amumu ganked mid at 3.14 for first blood where were you? in jungle? he succesfully snowballed mid and got carried, where as you took all the kills but couldnt carry.

> [{quoted}](name=IronFist,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tY60EhGQ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-26T22:30:45.803+0000)
>
> He's right, unless you intend on carrying the game, leave as many kills as you can. also its not about "you shouldnt blame your team" but more of "what could you have done better". your top and mid got stomped you need to help them more, amumu ganked mid at 3.14 for first blood where were you? in jungle? he succesfully snowballed mid and got carried, where as you took all the kills but couldnt carry.

Nah i know what you both mean, and in that particular fight i was in it, amumu and i ganked at the same time but he got to my midlaner first. And I try to leave kills, but my carries are always too low to secure them.
